alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 20 at 1:14AM PDT until October 20 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast, including most sections of Highway 101 from Port Orford northward and also from Gold Beach southward. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow for plenty of room between you and other vehicles. * Fog makes objects appear farther away than they are * Use low beams. High beams reflect back thick fog, making visibility worse for you and other drivers.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
